data.text: @HSCBoard 30% of surgeons DON'T wear masks https://t.co/vVbWW72AxE

@HSCBoard Nasal passages should not be covered as this hinders the free circulation of air! This clipping is from 1928.they learned from the Spanish 'Flu ' that masks are useless https://t.co/VXKBIlk8bD
@HSCBoard Masks do not keep anyone safe from a 'virus' I'm baffled at patients being given this false information https://t.co/qn0S6fk2gI

@HSCBoard @SMcLaughlinmla And Hospitals! I couldn't believe the amount of coming and going inside the Ulster Hospital and RVH people not wearing masks. Mask policies are still in place in the hospitals my consultant said. Please push this as many of us are going there for a reason  #CancerAwareness
